      • addPeopleToElevator

        public void addPeopleToElevator(Elevator e)
                         throws InvalidParameterException
        Method to add people from this floor to an elevator that is going in the people's desired direction. Only adds them if the elevator is not at full capacity yet.
        Specified by:
        addPeopleToElevator in interface Floor
        Parameters:
        e - - The elevator instance to add the people to.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - if input data is invalid - specified by error message

      • pressControlBox

        public void pressControlBox(int direction)
                     throws InvalidParameterException
        Called when a Person is generated and needs to get to a new floor. This floor gets added to the ElevatorController's pending requests.
        Specified by:
        pressControlBox in interface Floor
        Parameters:
        direction - - The direction that the new Person needs to go
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException
